subtasks.description: This subtask involves learning about the fundamental concepts and principles of Machine Learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, training and testing datasets, and evaluation metrics.
subtasks.name: Understanding the basics of Machine Learning

subtasks.description: In this subtask, you will dive deeper into various Machine Learning algorithms such as decision trees, logistic regression, support vector machines, and random forests. Gain an understanding of how these algorithms work and their applications.
subtasks.name: Exploring different Machine Learning algorithms

subtasks.description: This subtask involves gaining hands-on experience in implementing Machine Learning algorithms using Python libraries such as scikit-learn. Learn how to preprocess data, split datasets, train models, and evaluate their performance.
subtasks.name: Implementing Machine Learning algorithms in Python

subtasks.description: In this subtask, you will learn why data preprocessing is essential in Machine Learning. Gain an understanding of different techniques such as handling missing data, feature scaling, and handling categorical variables.
subtasks.name: Understanding the importance of data preprocessing

subtasks.description: This subtask involves learning how to clean and transform raw data into a suitable format for Machine Learning tasks. Explore techniques like outlier detection, data normalization, and feature extraction.
subtasks.name: Cleaning and transforming data

subtasks.description: In this subtask, you will learn techniques for integrating multiple datasets and reducing the dimensionality of feature space. Gain hands-on experience with methods like principal component analysis (PCA) and feature selection.
subtasks.name: Data integration and reduction techniques

subtasks.description: In this subtask, you will learn about different evaluation metrics used in assessing the performance of Machine Learning models. Gain insights into metrics like accuracy, precision, recall, and F1 score.
subtasks.name: Understanding evaluation metrics

subtasks.description: This subtask involves exploring cross-validation techniques like k-fold cross-validation and stratified sampling. Learn how to use these methods to estimate the performance of models on unseen data.
subtasks.name: Cross-validation techniques

subtasks.description: In this subtask, you will learn how to optimize the hyperparameters of Machine Learning models to improve their performance. Explore techniques like grid search and random search.
subtasks.name: Hyperparameter tuning

subtasks.description: This subtask involves understanding ensemble learning techniques such as bagging, boosting, and stacking. Gain insights into combining multiple models to improve overall performance.
subtasks.name: Ensemble learning

subtasks.description: In this subtask, you will dive into the field of Deep Learning. Gain an understanding of neural networks, activation functions, convolutional neural networks (CNNs), and recurrent neural networks (RNNs).
subtasks.name: Deep Learning

subtasks.description: This subtask involves exploring Natural Language Processing techniques. Learn how to process and analyze text data, build language models, and perform sentiment analysis.
subtasks.name: Natural Language Processing (NLP)

roadmap_suggestions.title: AI Researcher
roadmap_suggestions.overview: Roadmap for becoming an AI Researcher with a focus on AI, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning technologies
learning_objectives: Understand deep learning architectures and algorithms
Implement neural network models using PyTorch
Explore advanced machine learning concepts and techniques
prerequisites: Solid understanding of Python, programming, and data structures
Familiarity with Next.js, React.js, Node.js for web development
sample_courses: Neural Networks and Deep Learning on Udemy
